narrative: The Nieblas Stabel Trust holds mineral and royalty interests. Within the target drilling area (T11N-R64W: S10, S15, S22), the Trust owns 320 net mineral acres in the E1/2 of Section 22. This interest was acquired from Marilynn M. Stabel via a Quit Claim Mineral Deed dated November 12, 2021. The Trust has leased its mineral rights to Contex Energy Company LLC and retains a 19% royalty interest.
addresses: 14234 W. Parkland Dr., Sun City West, AZ 85375
